tasks.label: Setup (Windows, pip)
args: if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { py -3 -m venv .venv }; . .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel; pip install -r requirements.txt jupyterlab notebook jupytext ipykernel; python -m ipykernel install --user --name on-llm --display-name 'Python (on-llm)';

tasks.label: Setup (macOS/Linux, pip)
args: python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel && pip install -r requirements.txt jupyterlab notebook jupytext ipykernel && python -m ipykernel install --user --name on-llm --display-name 'Python (on-llm)'
